title: Salesforce Architect (AI Skills)远程办公-英语流利
summary_chinese: AI解决方案设计,Salesforce,Apex & LWC,生成式AI,外企,英语流利
summary_english: AI Solution Design,Salesforce,Apex & LWC,Generative AI,Foreign Enterprise,Fluent English
description:
请投递英文简历，外企的外包职位，介意勿投。
此职位远程办公，英语流利，需要英语面试！
Required Qualifications
• Minimum 6 years in software/application development, with at least 4 years working within Salesforce environments.
• Strong experience in Apex and JavaScript, plus exposure to languages like Python, Java, or C#.
• Hands-on expertise in key Salesforce technologies: Flows, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Visualforce.
• Working knowledge of front-end web technologies: HTML & CSS.
• Practical experience with version control (branching & pull requests) and CI/CD/DevOps workflows.
• Excellent communications skills: able to articulate complex technical solutions to varied audiences.
Preferred Skills
• Previous experience working with Agentic AI systems and generative AI models.
• Salesforce certifications such as Platform Developer II or Agentforce Specialist.
Technical & Soft Skill Profile
• System architectural mindset: capable of shaping AI-first customer engagement through thoughtful, scalable design.
• AI & automation expertise: building intelligent agents that understand context, make decisions, and execute backend processes within Agentforce.
• Problem-solving orientation: enjoy identifying challenges, co-designing solutions, and balancing technical constraints to deliver outcomes.
• Collaboration across disciplines: skilled at engaging developers, UX designers, data specialists, and stakeholders to drive integrated AI implementations.
description_chinese:
请投递英文简历，外企的外包职位，介意勿投。
此职位远程办公，英语流利，需要英语面试！
任职要求
• 至少6年软件/应用开发经验，其中至少4年在Salesforce环境中工作。
• 丰富的Apex和JavaScript经验，并接触过Python、Java或C#等语言。
• 精通关键的Salesforce技术：Flows、Lightning Web Components (LWC)、Visualforce。
• 具备前端Web技术的工作知识：HTML和CSS。
• 具备版本控制（分支和拉取请求）以及CI/CD/DevOps工作流的实践经验。
• 优秀的沟通技巧：能够向不同背景的听众清晰地阐述复杂的技术解决方案。
加分技能
• 有使用Agentic AI系统和生成式AI模型的工作经验者优先。
• 拥有Platform Developer II或Agentforce Specialist等Salesforce认证者优先。
技术与软技能要求
• 系统架构思维：能够通过深思熟虑、可扩展的设计，塑造以AI为先的客户互动模式。
• AI与自动化专业知识：构建能够理解上下文、做出决策并在Agentforce内执行后端流程的智能代理。
• 问题解决导向：乐于识别挑战、协同设计解决方案，并平衡技术限制以交付成果。
• 跨学科协作能力：善于与开发人员、UX设计师、数据专家和利益相关者合作，推动集成的AI实施。
description_english:
Please submit your resume in English. This is an outsourced position for a foreign enterprise; please do not apply if you mind.
This is a remote position. Fluent English is required, and the interview will be conducted in English!
Required Qualifications
• Minimum 6 years in software/application development, with at least 4 years working within Salesforce environments.
• Strong experience in Apex and JavaScript, plus exposure to languages like Python, Java, or C#.
• Hands-on expertise in key Salesforce technologies: Flows, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Visualforce.
• Working knowledge of front-end web technologies: HTML & CSS.
• Practical experience with version control (branching & pull requests) and CI/CD/DevOps workflows.
• Excellent communications skills: able to articulate complex technical solutions to varied audiences.
Preferred Skills

• Salesforce certifications such as Platform Developer II or Agentforce Specialist.
Technical & Soft Skill Profile
• System architectural mindset: capable of shaping AI-first customer engagement through thoughtful, scalable design.
• AI & automation expertise: building intelligent agents that understand context, make decisions, and execute backend processes within Agentforce.
• Problem-solving orientation: enjoy identifying challenges, co-designing solutions, and balancing technical constraints to deliver outcomes.
• Collaboration across disciplines: skilled at engaging developers, UX designers, data specialists, and stakeholders to drive integrated AI implementations.

title: 北京大区经理-远程办公
team: 阿帕数字技术有限公司
summary_chinese: 解决方案销售,物流贸易行业,国企平台对接,政府人脉资源,数字化项目运作
summary_english: Solution Selling,Logistics & Trade Industry,SOE Platform Engagement,Government Network & Resources,Digital Project Operations
description:
职责描述：
1. 负责所在区域内的销售工作，针对物贸一体平台进行销售；
2. 做到顾问式营销，维系好已有客户资源；
3. 定期拜访客户，建立、发展及维护重点客户关系；
4. 确保销售款项的回收，接受并协助处理客户投诉；
5. 配合市场部销售部做好所辖销售区域内的相关市场活动，收集市场信息并及时反馈给公司；
6. 制定工作计划，定期进行工作总结、完成相关销售报告。
任职要求：
1、大专及以上学历；
2、具备10年以上工作经验，拥有5年以上国企平台公司对接经验；
3、拥有深厚的政府（交通、工信）人脉资源，具备出色的政府高层沟通和谈判能力，有数字化项目运作经验；
4、负责所辖区域的解决方案销售工作；有强烈的事业心，能承受全国出差与高强度工作，具备良好的职业素养和问题解决能力。

title: 产品经理实习生（产品设计方向/双休/外企/远程办公）
title_chinese: 产品经理实习生（产品设计方向）
summary: 可转正,实习证明,远程实习,AI产品,B端产品,跨境物流,需求梳理,原型设计,PRD撰写,数据整理/分析,货运/物流/仓储,贸易/进出口
summary_chinese: 跨境物流产品设计,跨境物流,美国拖车业务,数据驱动,PRD与原型设计,外企,实习可转正
summary_english: Cross-border Logistics Product Design,Cross-border Logistics,US Trucking Business,Data-driven,PRD & Prototype Design,Foreign Enterprise,Internship with Return Offer Potential
description:
岗位工作地点：[远程办公]
岗位职责：
1、协助产品经理进行美国拖车业务相关产品的需求梳理与分析，参与用户调研、需求访谈纪要整理，为产品迭代提供基础支撑；
2、参与产品数据监控体系搭建，定期收集、整理业务核心数据，通过数据洞察挖掘用户需求与产品优化点；
3、辅助完成产品原型设计、PRD文档撰写等基础工作，配合研发、运营团队推进产品落地与上线后的效果跟踪；
4、关注美国拖车行业动态、跨境物流政策及AI在产品领域的应用趋势，定期输出行业信息简报；
5、协助完成产品项目推进中的跨部门沟通协调工作，确保信息同步高效、项目节点有序推进。
任职要求：
1、在读研究生，计算机科学与技术、软件工程、数据科学等计算机相关专业优先；
2、对跨境物流（尤其是美国本地物流服务、拖车业务）有浓厚兴趣，愿意深入了解行业痛点与业务逻辑；
3、具备扎实的数据思维，对数据敏感，能通过基础数据工具（如Excel、SQL）进行数据整理与简单分析；
4、对产品经理岗位有清晰认知，了解产品从需求到上线的完整流程，对AI与数据驱动型产品有强烈探索意愿；
5、每周可稳定实习3-4天，实习周期不少于6个月，能快速融入团队并承担相应工作；
6、具备良好的沟通表达能力、逻辑思维能力及问题解决能力，工作认真细致、有责任心。
你将获得：
1、深耕跨境拖车业务的一线经验，直面中美跨境服务的核心痛点与产品机会；
2、资深PM一对一指导，系统学习产品设计、数据驱动决策的实战方法；
3、接触AI在跨境产品中的应用场景，积累数据驱动产品迭代的实践经历；
开放包容的团队氛围，完善的实习培养体系及表现优秀者的转正机会；
公司背景：
1、 创始人团队由北美物流专家、SaaS领域专家以及具有丰富跨国公司战略经验的专业人士共同组建，团队成员在跨境物流行业拥有数十年的深厚经验；
2、 Trucking Simplified---致力于提供便捷的北美卡车履约方案；
3、 公司设有旧金山、洛杉矶、深圳坂田三处办公场地；
4、 自主设计开发独具竞争力的询价系统，推动公司盈利倍速增长；
5、 公司网址：https://www.drayeasy.com
6、企业文化：真诚、高质、高标、高效、专一、专注、专业。

岗位职责：
1、协助产品经理进行美国拖车业务相关产品的需求梳理与分析，参与用户调研、需求访谈纪要整理，为产品迭代提供基础支撑；

2、资深PM一对一指导，系统学习产品设计、数据驱动决策的实战方法；
3、接触AI在跨境产品中的应用场景，积累数据驱动产品迭代的实践经历；
4、开放包容的团队氛围，完善的实习培养体系及表现优秀者的转正机会。

公司背景：
1、 创始人团队由北美物流专家、SaaS领域专家以及具有丰富跨国公司战略经验的专业人士共同组建，团队成员在跨境物流行业拥有数十年的深厚经验；
2、 Trucking Simplified---致力于提供便捷的北美卡车履约方案；
3、 公司设有旧金山、洛杉矶、深圳坂田三处办公场地；
4、 自主设计开发独具竞争力的询价系统，推动公司盈利倍速增长；
5、 公司网址：https://www.drayeasy.com
6、企业文化：真诚、高质、高标、高效、专一、专注、专业。
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Assist the Product Manager in grooming and analyzing requirements for products related to the US trucking business; participate in user research and organizing minutes from user interviews to provide foundational support for product iteration.
2. Participate in building the product data monitoring system; regularly collect and organize core business data, and leverage data insights to uncover user needs and product optimization points.
3. Assist with basic tasks such as prototype design and PRD documentation; coordinate with R&D and operations teams to advance product implementation and track post-launch performance.
4. Follow industry trends in the US trucking sector, cross-border logistics policies, and the application of AI in the product field; regularly produce industry information briefings.
5. Assist with cross-departmental communication and coordination during project advancement to ensure efficient information synchronization and orderly progress of project milestones.

Requirements:
1. Current postgraduate student, preferably majoring in Computer Science and Technology, Software Engineering, Data Science, or other related computer fields.
2. Strong interest in cross-border logistics (especially US local logistics services and trucking business), willing to delve into industry pain points and business logic.
3. Solid data-driven mindset, sensitive to data, and able to perform data organization and simple analysis using basic data tools (like Excel, SQL).
4. Clear understanding of the Product Manager role, familiar with the entire product lifecycle from requirements to launch, with a strong desire to explore AI and data-driven products.
5. Available for a stable internship of 3-4 days per week for a period of no less than 6 months; able to quickly integrate into the team and take on corresponding tasks.
6. Possess excellent communication, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills; diligent, detail-oriented, and responsible.

What you will gain:
1. First-hand experience in the cross-border trucking business, directly facing the core pain points and product opportunities of China-US cross-border services.
2. One-on-one guidance from a senior PM, systematically learning practical methods of product design and data-driven decision-making.
3. Exposure to AI application scenarios in cross-border products, accumulating practical experience in data-driven product iteration.
4. An open and inclusive team atmosphere, a comprehensive internship training system, and opportunities for conversion to a full-time position for outstanding performers.

Company Background:
1. The founding team is composed of North American logistics experts, SaaS domain experts, and professionals with extensive strategic experience in multinational corporations; team members have decades of profound experience in the cross-border logistics industry.
2. Trucking Simplified---committed to providing convenient North American trucking fulfillment solutions.
3. The company has offices in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Bantian, Shenzhen.
4. Independently designed and developed a highly competitive inquiry system, driving rapid growth in company profits.
5. Company website: https://www.drayeasy.com
6. Corporate culture: Sincere, High-Quality, High-Standard, High-Efficiency, Dedicated, Focused, Professional.

title: 俄罗斯跨境电商运营（WB/Kaspi/Ozon方向）+远程办公
title_chinese: 俄罗斯跨境电商运营 (WB/Kaspi/Ozon方向)
summary: ozon,KASPI,WB,广告投放,数据分析,成本优化,俄语,俄罗斯电商,电子商务,贸易/进出口
summary_chinese: 电商平台数据运营,俄罗斯跨境电商,WB/Kaspi/Ozon平台,广告投放与优化,成本优化与利润分析,远程兼职,弹性工作
summary_english: E-commerce Platform Data Operations,Russian Cross-border E-commerce,WB/Kaspi/Ozon Platforms,Ad Placement & Optimization,Cost Optimization & Profit Analysis,Remote Part-time,Flexible Work
description:
公司名称：美多美俄罗斯跨境电商
职位：
跨境电商运营（WB / Kaspi / Ozon方向，数据分析 / 广告 / 成本优化）
招聘人数：1
工作模式：远程办公
学历要求：大专以上
工作年限：3年以上（必须有俄罗斯电商实操经验）
岗位职责
1、按 SOP 执行 WB / Kaspi / Ozon 平台日常操作，包括上架、库存检查、调价、促销活动执行等；
2、数据整理与分析，跟踪曝光、点击率、转化率，记录并汇报异常情况；
3、协助广告投放及优化，明确何时投放、何时停止；
4、成本优化与利润分析，在不破坏权重的前提下提出可执行建议；
5、测评与风控记录，确保操作合规，避免违规风险；
6、按要求记录问题、提供改进建议，不擅自拍板或调整账号策略。
招聘要求（硬性条件）：
1、有俄罗斯电商平台 WB / Kaspi / Ozon 实操经验；
2、参与过链接起量、下滑恢复或新品冷启动项目；
3、能理解并解释核心数据：曝光、点击率、转化率、搜索流量与推荐流量差异；
4、能进行广告投放判断与优化；
5、成本优化意识强，懂得利润控制；
6、测评与风控意识清晰，不做违规操作；
7、沟通及时、执行力强。
面试必答题：
1-曝光下降时，你第一步会看哪些数据？为什么？
2-链接流量正常但转化率低，你会如何分析？
3-广告投放 ROI 低，你会怎么判断是否继续投？
4-产品销量突然下滑，库存充足，你能列出三个可能原因吗？
5-描述一次你参与恢复下滑链接的经历，具体操作和结果。
每月薪资：4000–8000 元（按经验和能力浮动）
工作方式：
远程办公，可灵活安排工作时间，但每日需按时完成数据整理和 SOP 执行任务
备注
本岗位为远程兼职，初期以执行 + 数据整理 + 诊断支持为主；
权限逐步放开，初期不做独立决策；
试用期 7–14 天，按考核表评估合格后长期合作。

4-产品销量突然下滑，库存充足，你能列出三个可能原因吗？
5-描述一次你参与恢复下滑链接的经历，具体操作和结果。
每月薪资：4000–8000 元（按经验和能力浮动）
工作方式：
远程办公，可灵活安排工作时间，但每日需按时完成数据整理和 SOP 执行任务
备注
本岗位为远程兼职，初期以执行 + 数据整理 + 诊断支持为主；
权限逐步放开，初期不做独立决策；
试用期 7–14 天，按考核表评估合格后长期合作。
description_english:
Company Name: Meiduomei Russian Cross-border E-commerce
Position:
Cross-border E-commerce Operations (WB / Kaspi / Ozon Platforms, specializing in Data Analysis / Advertising / Cost Optimization)
Number of Hires: 1
Work Model: Remote Work
Education Requirement: College degree or above
Years of Experience: 3+ years (must have hands-on experience with Russian e-commerce)
Job Responsibilities
1. Perform daily operations on WB / Kaspi / Ozon platforms according to SOP, including product listing, inventory checks, price adjustments, promotional event execution, etc.
2. Organize and analyze data, track impressions, click-through rates, conversion rates, and report anomalies.
3. Assist with ad placement and optimization, determining when to launch and stop campaigns.
4. Optimize costs and analyze profits, providing actionable suggestions without negatively affecting product ranking.
5. Record product reviews and risk control measures to ensure compliant operations and avoid policy violation risks.
6. Document issues and provide improvement suggestions as required, without making unauthorized decisions or adjusting account strategies.
Job Requirements (Hard Skills):
1. Hands-on experience with Russian e-commerce platforms WB / Kaspi / Ozon.
2. Experience with projects involving boosting product links, recovering from declining traffic, or cold-starting new products.
3. Ability to understand and explain core metrics: impressions, click-through rate, conversion rate, and the difference between search traffic and recommended traffic.
4. Ability to make judgments and optimizations for ad campaigns.
5. Strong cost optimization awareness and understanding of profit control.
6. Clear awareness of product reviews and risk control, avoiding non-compliant operations.
7. Timely communication and strong execution skills.
Mandatory Interview Questions:
1. When impressions drop, what data do you check first and why?
2. If a product link has normal traffic but a low conversion rate, how would you analyze it?
3. If an ad campaign has a low ROI, how would you decide whether to continue it?
4. If a product's sales suddenly decline with sufficient inventory, can you list three possible reasons?
5. Describe an experience where you helped recover a declining product link, including specific actions and results.
Monthly Salary: 4000–8000 RMB (flexible based on experience and ability)
Work Style:
Remote work with flexible hours, but daily data organization and SOP tasks must be completed on time.
Notes
This is a remote part-time position, initially focused on execution + data organization + diagnostic support.
Permissions will be granted gradually; no independent decision-making in the initial phase.
Probation period of 7–14 days, with long-term cooperation upon successful evaluation against the assessment criteria.

title: AI产品经理（可远程办公）
summary: 大模型,AIGC,人工智能,计算机软件,云计算/大数据
summary_chinese: Agent产品规划设计,大模型与多模态,用户需求挖掘分析,熟悉主流Agent产品,应届毕业生优先,硕士及以上学历
summary_english: Agent Product Planning and Design,Large Models and Multimodality,User Requirement Mining and Analysis,Familiar with Mainstream Agent Products,Fresh Graduates Preferred,Master's Degree or Above
description:
【岗位职责】
1、AI 技术研究与探索：持续跟踪全球前沿 AI 技术动态（如大模型、多模态、强化学习等），主动研究和探索新技术在实际业务场景中的应用可能性，形成技术调研报告与落地初步方案。
2、Agent 产品规划与设计：主导 Agent 类产品（如智能助手、自动化任务 Agent、多智能体协作系统等）的产品逻辑梳理、功能规划与交互设计，明确产品定位、核心价值与迭代路线，输出高质量产品需求文档（PRD）、原型图等。
3、跨团队协作推进：协同算法工程师、开发工程师、测试工程师等团队，清晰传递产品需求与技术落地目标，跟进产品研发全流程，解决开发过程中的产品相关问题，确保 Agent 产品按计划上线 与迭代。
4、用户需求挖掘与分析：通过用户调研、数据分析、竞品分析等方式，深度挖掘目标用户在 AI 产品（尤其是 Agent 类产品）使用中的核心需求与痛点，转化为具体的产品优化方向，提升用户体验与产品竞争力。
5、产品数据监控与迭代：建立 Agent 产品关键数据指标（如用户活跃度、任务完成率、交互满意度等）监控体系，定期分析数据表现，结合用户反馈与技术发展趋势，制定产品迭代策略，持续优化产品功能与性能。
【任职要求】
1、学历与专业：硕士及以上学历，计算机科学与技术、人工智能、数据科学、软件工程等相关专业，应届毕业生优先。
2、AI 技术热情与探索能力：热爱研究和探索 AI 技术，对 AI 领域（尤其是大模型、Agent 技术）有浓厚兴趣，具备主动学习新技术的能力，能快速理解复杂 AI 技术原理与应用场景。
3、Agent 产品逻辑认知：熟悉热门 Agent 产品（如 ChatGPT Agent、AutoGPT、Claude Agent、国内主流智能助手 Agent 等）的产品逻辑、架构设计与核心功能，能清晰分析其优势与不足，并提出创新优化思路。
4、产品基础能力：具备良好的逻辑思维能力、需求分析能力与文档撰写能力，能独立完成产品需求文档、竞品分析报告等；了解产品研发基本流程，对用户体验有较高敏感度。
5、沟通与协作能力：具备优秀的跨团队沟通能力与协作意识，能高效协调不同角色推进工作；具备较强的抗压能力，能适应快速变化的 AI 产品研发节奏。
6、加分项：有 AI 产品相关实习经历（如参与过 Agent 产品设计、大模型应用产品开发等）、发表过 AI 技术相关论文、拥有个人 AI 项目（如自主开发小型 Agent 工具）者优先。

【岗位职责】
1、AI 技术研究与探索：持续跟踪全球前沿 AI 技术动态（如大模型、多模态、强化学习等），主动研究和探索新技术在实际业务场景中的应用可能性，形成技术调研报告与落地初步方案。

4、产品基础能力：具备良好的逻辑思维能力、需求分析能力与文档撰写能力，能独立完成产品需求文档、竞品分析报告等；了解产品研发基本流程，对用户体验有较高敏感度。
5、沟通与协作能力：具备优秀的跨团队沟通能力与协作意识，能高效协调不同角色推进工作；具备较强的抗压能力，能适应快速变化的 AI 产品研发节奏。
6、加分项：有 AI 产品相关实习经历（如参与过 Agent 产品设计、大模型应用产品开发等）、发表过 AI 技术相关论文、拥有个人 AI 项目（如自主开发小型 Agent 工具）者优先。
description_english:
[Responsibilities]
1. AI Technology Research & Exploration: Continuously track global cutting-edge AI technology trends (e.g., large models, multimodality, reinforcement learning), proactively research and explore the applicability of new technologies in practical business scenarios, and produce technology research reports and preliminary implementation plans.
2. Agent Product Planning & Design: Lead the product logic definition, feature planning, and interaction design for Agent-like products (e.g., intelligent assistants, automated task agents, multi-agent collaboration systems). Define product positioning, core value, and iteration roadmaps, and produce high-quality Product Requirement Documents (PRDs), prototypes, etc.
3. Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with algorithm engineers, development engineers, test engineers, and other teams to clearly communicate product requirements and technical implementation goals. Follow up on the entire product R&D process, resolve product-related issues during development, and ensure Agent products are launched and iterated on schedule.
4. User Need Mining & Analysis: Through user research, data analysis, competitive analysis, and other methods, deeply uncover the core needs and pain points of target users when using AI products (especially Agent-like products). Translate these insights into concrete product optimization directions to enhance user experience and product competitiveness.
5. Product Data Monitoring & Iteration: Establish a monitoring system for key data indicators of Agent products (e.g., user activity, task completion rate, interaction satisfaction). Regularly analyze data performance and, combined with user feedback and technological trends, formulate product iteration strategies to continuously optimize product features and performance.
[Requirements]
1. Education & Major: Master's degree or above in Computer Science and Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Software Engineering, or related fields. Fresh graduates are preferred.
2. Passion for AI & Exploratory Ability: Passionate about researching and exploring AI technologies, with a strong interest in the AI field (especially large models and Agent technology). Possess the ability to actively learn new technologies and quickly understand complex AI principles and application scenarios.
3. Understanding of Agent Product Logic: Familiar with the product logic, architectural design, and core features of popular Agent products (e.g., ChatGPT Agent, AutoGPT, Claude Agent, mainstream domestic intelligent assistant Agents). Able to clearly analyze their strengths and weaknesses and propose innovative optimization ideas.
4. Fundamental Product Skills: Possess strong logical thinking, requirements analysis, and documentation skills. Capable of independently completing Product Requirement Documents, competitive analysis reports, etc. Understand the basic product R&D process and have a high sensitivity to user experience.
5. Communication & Collaboration Skills: Excellent cross-functional communication and collaboration skills, able to efficiently coordinate different roles to advance work. Strong ability to work under pressure and adapt to the fast-paced rhythm of AI product development.
6. Bonus Points: Preference will be given to candidates with internship experience in AI products (e.g., participated in Agent product design, large model application development), published AI technology-related papers, or have personal AI projects (e.g., developed a small-scale Agent tool).

title: 远程办公（国际）猎头顾问
team: 北京福睿思特国际人力资源有限公司
summary: 高端岗位招聘,人力资源服务
summary_chinese: 国际人才寻访,全流程招聘管理,LinkedIn/WhatsApp,流利英语/外语,Offer谈判,高额提成
summary_english: International Talent Sourcing,Full-cycle Recruitment Management,LinkedIn/WhatsApp,Fluent English/Foreign Language,Offer Negotiation,High Commission
description:
岗位职责:
1.根据客户公司的用人要求，配合合作顾问完成行业、客户和职位以及JD的分析，完成research环节，定位人选 sourcing方向。
2.通过网络渠道(LinkedIn或WhatsApp或其他)、人脉网开展sourcing工作，寻找到符合职位要求的CV，并与 candidate进行电话、邮件或视频沟通，推荐客户公司职位的同时了解人选更多信息，做职位匹配性确认，并推荐到客户公司。
3.负责后续人选的面试安排及跟进、反馈、offer谈判、入职工作。
4.保证个人年度baseline要求回款业绩目标的完成。任职资格:
1.统招本科以上学历，英语或其它语种口语流利;
2.可以接受工作性质和挑战、压力;
3.自驱力强，可以在家办公但是主动推动工作而不是被催促，工作有持久力。
4.优秀的沟通能力，文字撰写能力强。
5.熟练使用领英及其他相关国际人才招聘渠道优先。薪酬结构:
基本工资+40%到70%的提成+季度绩效

岗位职责:
1.根据客户公司的用人要求，配合合作顾问完成行业、客户和职位以及JD的分析，完成research环节，定位人选 sourcing方向。
2.通过网络渠道(LinkedIn或WhatsApp或其他)、人脉网开展sourcing工作，寻找到符合职位要求的CV，并与 candidate进行电话、邮件或视频沟通，推荐客户公司职位的同时了解人选更多信息，做职位匹配性确认，并推荐到客户公司。
3.负责后续人选的面试安排及跟进、反馈、offer谈判、入职工作。
4.保证个人年度baseline要求回款业绩目标的完成。

任职资格:
1.统招本科以上学历，英语或其它语种口语流利;
2.可以接受工作性质和挑战、压力;
3.自驱力强，可以在家办公但是主动推动工作而不是被催促，工作有持久力。
4.优秀的沟通能力，文字撰写能力强。
5.熟练使用领英及其他相关国际人才招聘渠道优先。

薪酬结构:
基本工资+40%到70%的提成+季度绩效
description_english:
Responsibilities:
1. Based on the client company's hiring requirements, collaborate with consulting partners to analyze the industry, client, position, and JD; complete the research phase and define the candidate sourcing direction.
2. Conduct sourcing activities through online channels (LinkedIn, WhatsApp, etc.) and personal networks to find CVs that meet job requirements. Communicate with candidates via phone, email, or video to recommend client positions, gather more information, confirm job suitability, and present them to the client company.
3. Responsible for subsequent candidate interview scheduling, follow-up, feedback, offer negotiation, and onboarding.
4. Ensure the achievement of personal annual baseline revenue collection targets.

Qualifications:
1. Bachelor's degree or above from a nationally recognized university; fluent in spoken English or other languages.
2. Able to accept the nature of the work, challenges, and pressure.
3. Strong self-drive; able to work from home and proactively advance tasks without needing to be pushed; possesses work endurance.
4. Excellent communication skills and strong writing abilities.
5. Proficiency in using LinkedIn and other relevant international talent recruitment channels is preferred.

Compensation Structure:
Base Salary + 40% to 70% Commission + Quarterly Performance Bonus

title: web3前端工程师（可远程办公）
team: 江苏薇米区块链科技有限公司
summary_chinese: DApp开发,区块链,Vue.js,MetaMask,响应式开发,组件化开发
description:
工作职责：
1、参与区块链前端项目的开发和维护；
2、参与相关周边应用和DAPP开发, 建设生态内容, 完善系统安全性和稳定性；
3、与团队合作，设计和实现创新的区块链解决方案，提升用户体验；
4、负责前端代码规范制定、代码质量监控等工作；
5、编写高质量的代码，并进行充分的测试和调试。
任职要求：
1、精通js vue2 vue3 等主流web前端技术，精通ES5、ES6语法，并使用这些技术做过3年以上实际业务的前端开发。
2、能够快速根据用户需求和UI设计进行分析并开发，对主流浏览器和移动端兼容性有解决思路，有丰富的UI和响应式开发经验。
3、精通面向组件的前端开发模式，对组件规划、封装工作有相关经验。
4、熟悉与后端交互的方式和服务器配置部署 。
5、学习能力强(尤其重要)，对于新领域新技术有热情 愿意研究(介意勿投)。
6、有与web3 metamask对接相关经验更佳
